alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hansford; Hartley; Moore; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 9:22PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Texas, eastern Cimarron, northwestern Hansford, Sherman, eastern Dallam, Moore and eastern Hartley Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 920 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elkhart to near Stratford to 6 miles west of Channing. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dumas, Dalhart, Stratford, Hartley, Cactus, Sunray, Goodwell, Channing, Keyes, Hough, Griggs, Eva, Four Way, Conlen, Masterson, Texhoma and Sturgis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Oklahoma...and the Panhandle of Texas.
